components: 怠 (lazy) + 者 (professional) = 怠け者 (sloth )
labels: NEO
description: sloth - a lazy person, as well as a fairly lazy transliteration for "sloth, the animal."

components: 芸 (art) + 能 (talent) + 界 (the world) = 芸能界 (showbiz)
性 (sex / essential nature) + 能 (talent) = 性能 (capability)
description: capability (of a machine) i.e. "The new iphone has more 性能 than a regular keitai."

components: 能 (talent) + 力 (strong) = 能力 (capability)
description: capability (i.e. this computer has the capability to burn DVDs)

components: 熊 (bear) + 系 (group, tribe) = 熊系 (gay-ass bear)
labels: NEO
description: lit. 'bear tribe' - a gay man who's kind of chubby and furry and lumberjack-looking

components: 態 (looks like) + 度 (times) = 態度 (attitude/ stance)
description: an attitude/manner (defiant, peaceful, etc.) or stance (anti-trade, pro-shinto, anti-corporate). When it comes to the first meaning, 態度 is something you can tell just by looking at the person - they might not be doing it intentionally.

components: 状 (circumstance) + 態 (looks like) = 状態 (state)
description: the state or status of something: water is the liquid state of h20, but ice is the solid state. State of shock. Pristine state. Also can mean the state of affairs : good, bad, deadlocked, deteroriorating, improving.

components: 擬 (sham) + 態 (looks like) + 語 (language) = 擬態語 (emotional sound-effect)
labels: 1/2 KANA
description: 擬態語 is a　very Japanese concept - a sound effect for something that doesn't make noise - usually emotional states. The only English example of 擬態語 I can think of is ' bling.'

components: 仏 (Buddha) + 教 (teach) = 仏教 (Buddhism)
大 (big) + 仏 (Buddha) = 大仏 (giant-ass statue of buddha.)
labels: KUNKUN
SARC FR
description: adam's apple- literally "throat buddha"!

components: 香 (good smell) + 辛 (spicy / painful) + 料 (ingredients / fees) = 香辛料 (spices)
description: spices - not just hot ones. This is the only word you'll ever need the onyomi for. Sorry.

components: 幸 (luck, happiness) + 運 (carry / luck) = 幸運 (good luck)
description: luckily, xxxx. Or, 'good luck' (good luck learning all these bastards!)

components: 不 (un) + 幸 (luck, happiness) = 不幸 (bad luck; unfortunately)
主 (master/mainly) + 宰 (manager) = 主宰 (preside over)
labels: NP
description: preside over, or head something temporary. (not a corporation or university, but maybe an event or comittee that a corporation or university would hold)

meaning: how much, how many, for how long?
labels: KANA

components: 一 (one) + 位 (rank) = 一位 (first-ranked)
位 (rank) + 置 (put down on table) = 位置 (geographic location)
description: be located at a certain spot (as in, the 7-11 is located north of the mountains but south of the sea)

components: 文 (culture/ sentence) + 章 (emblem / chapter) = 文章 (sentence)
腕 (arm / skill) + 章 (emblem / chapter) = 腕章 (armband)
description: armband. Anytime you see an unemployed grand-dad with an armband, you can be sure he will poke his nose in someone's business and try to wreck their fun:"No smoking!" "No bicycle parking!" "No hammocks!"

components: 暗 (dark) + 記 (diary) = 暗記 (memorize)
暗 (dark) + 殺 (kill) = 暗殺 (assassination)
注 (pour / be careful) + 意 (meaning) = 注意 (be careful!)
description: be careful! caution! (when used as a 'suru' verb, it means, 'to warn')

components: 意 (meaning) + 識 (be conscious) = 意識 (awareness)
description: to have an awareness or be conscious of something- women are conscious of potential rapists in an everyday, peripheral way that men are not. Hippies are environmentally conscious. That's ishiki.

components: 記 (diary) + 憶 (recollect) = 記憶 (memory)
description: memory. Not a specific one, but like, "My memory is shot from too much drugs."

components: 召 (summon) + 上 (above) = 召し上がる (let's eat)
labels: F
description: Very polite way to say, "let's eat" to a superior person. This sounds like you don't need it, but when you go to a restaurant, YOU, believe it or not, are a superior person, and so you'll need to know this word to understand what the waiter is saying to you.

components: 昭 (shining / Showa era) + 和 (peace/ Japan) = 昭和 (Showa Era)
labels: CCW
description:
Showa Era： (In Japan, a new　時代 (era) begins every time a new Emperor is crowned, and lasts until the next one is crowned. The Japanese - like Pol Pot - start counting from Year One every time they enter a new era.

The era doesn't use the Emperor's real name, but his official nickname, which seems a bit informal, but try being logical with an emperor-lover and see where it gets you.

Anyway, the Showa era, according to wikipedia, was from 1926-1989.

components: 対 (against) + 照 (contrast) = 対照 (contrast)

labels: SUF
description:
although くすり means medicine in general, XXX剤 means, 'XXX kind of medicine.'

For example, and you don't need to remember these: 解熱剤 (げねつざい)： anti-fever medicine, or 下剤(げざい): a laxative medicine

components: 罰 (punishment) + ム () = 罰ゲーム (penalty game.)
description: a truth-or-dare kind of "penalty game."

components: 罰 (punishment) + 金 (gold) = 罰金 (a fine)
刃 (blade) + 物 (animal / thing) = 刃物 (edged weapon.or kitchen cutlery )
labels: KUNKUN

components: 忍 (hide / endure) + 者 (professional) = 忍者 (NINJA!!!)
description: it's a -- Quick, look behind you!!!!!!!!!!!!!

components: 忍 (hide / endure) + 耐 (withstand) = 忍耐 (forbear, endure)
labels: NP
description: patience, forbearance -basically it is a more formal version of 我慢　（がまん）. However, 我慢 can be used in the active sense of "keep doing what you're doing, keep rolling that rock up the hill, don't quit." Whereas, 忍耐 has more a passive nuance - "Continue doing nothing, fight the urge to counter-attack or snap back."

components: 確 (make certain) + 認 (admit) = 確認 (double-check)
description: to double-check something.

components: 参 (admit defeat / visit) + 加 (add) = 参加 (join)
description: to join a group, or participate in something

components: 加 (add) + 減 (decrease) = いい加減 (unfounded, pointless)
labels: CCW
description: unfounded or groundless. Not a lie exactly, but someone who is just bullshitting, talking without saying anything meaningful or definite. Also means, working in a haphazard, hit-or-miss fashion.

components: 増 (increase) + 加 (add) = 増加 (an increase)
labels: NP

components: 妥 (compromise) + 協 (cooperate) = 妥協 (compromise)
脅 (threaten) + 迫 (press upon) = 脅迫 (intimidate)
labels: NP
description: more formal than　脅す 　. Not just to threaten, but to be intimidating.

components: 研 (polish, sharpen) + 究 (research) = 研究 (research)
究 (research) + 極 (extreme) = 究極 (ultimate, definitive)
description: the ultimate, definitive, comprehensive something-or-other

components: 熟 (get good at) + 語 (language) = 熟語 (compound word)
description: YEAHHH!! At last, the kanji for "compound word."

components: 未 (not yet) + 熟 (get good at) = 未熟 (not yet good at something.)
執 (to hella do) + 着 (wear / arrive) = 執着 (persistent / obsessed)
description: to be attached obsessed with or persistent in doing something.

components: 劣 (inferiority) + 化 (transform) = 劣化 (to degrade or deteriorate)
劣 (inferiority) + 等 (equal /etc./plural) + 感 (feeling) = 劣等感 (inferiority complex)
labels: NP

components: 微 (teeny) + 妙 (odd) = 微妙 (meh!)
description:
a nice way of saying, 'meh.'

"How did you like the play?"

"Bimyou."

components: 奇 (strange) + 妙 (odd) = 奇妙 (weird)
description: weird - but more broad than the related term 妙. 奇妙 means unusual and absurd - a street-person wearing a duck as a hat is 奇妙.

components: 省 (ministry / cut down on) + 略 (abbreviation) = 省略 (abbreviate or leave out)
description: ｔｏ　ａｂｂｒｅｖｉａｔｅ, omit, but also contraction. ( contractions like 'ain't' are 省略）

components: 反 (anti) + 省 (ministry / cut down on) = 反省 (soul-searching)
description: soul-searching, self-reflection : "Where did I go wrong?" (maybe when you started writing a kanji dictionary thinking that it would be less than 900 A4 pages?)

components: 務 (perform a task) + 省 (ministry / cut down on) = 務省 (Ministry of XXX)
labels: SUF
description: SUFFIX meaning, "the Ministry of XXX" (usually shortened to just xxx省）

components: 背 (stature / back of the body) + 景 (scene) = 背景 (background)
description: background (both in the sense of the background of a photo, and the background context of a story)

components: 景 (scene) + 色 (color) = 景色 (nice view)
labels: FP
description: A nice view - of nature or even the big crosswalk at Shibuya.

components: 展 (exhibit) + 示 (show) + 会 (big meeting) = 展示会 (trade-show)
description: an exhibition or trade-show (International Plumbing Equipment Expo 2010!)

components: 指 (finger / point at) + 示 (show) = 指示 (instructions　)
description: instructions　ー not like instructions from your boss, but like the instruction manual you get with your new vacuum cleaner.

components: 宗 (religion) + 教 (teach) = 宗教 (religion)

reading: しんこうしゅうきょう
components: 新 (new) + 興 (interest) + 宗教 (religion) = 新興 宗教 (cult)
description: new religion, (a polite way of saying 'cult'.)

components: 監 (oversee) + 督 (supervisor) = 監督 (director)
description: movie director/ construction foreman / coach.

components: 幼稚 (childish, immature) + 園 (public park) = 幼稚園 (kindergarten)
幼 (childhood) + 稚 (childish) = 幼稚 (childish, immature)
description: childish, immature, puerile. "Hey i wrote POOP on a picture of the president! Want to come see?"

components: 幼 (childhood) + 児 (baby) = 幼児 (child)
labels: NP
description: child (more a newspaper word: child abuse, child-rearing, etc.)

components: 玄 (deep profound) + 関 (connected to) = 玄関 (entryway)
description: entryway of an apartment or building

components: 幽 (occult) + 玄 (deep profound) = 幽玄 (occult)
description: occult! Mysterious! Old guy on a mountain wearing a Tengu-skin thong chanting and drawing Lovecraft symbols on a cave wall as he fondles ancient manuscripts! A calf is born with 3 heads - AND IT'S YOUR HALF-SISTER!

components: 畜 (raising of domestic animals) + 生 (life / birth) = 畜生 (asshole!)
labels: ABU 1/2 KANA
description:
comes from a word for beast, but in practice, it's used just like "You asshole!"

(also, you can use it as a simple "Damn it!" if you hit your thumb with a hammer)

components: 家 (home) + 畜 (raising of domestic animals) = 家畜 (livestock)
description: livestock, a farm animal

components: 貯 (save up) + 蓄 (store or put aside) = 貯蓄 (savings)
description: All savings, especially investments such as stocks, gold and gems.Or anything else you're hoarding.

components: 蓄 (store or put aside) + 積 (pile up) = 蓄積 (accumulate.)
description: accumulate. Used about bad things mostly - bills or stress piles up. Similar to 止まって来た (とまってきた） or 重なる (かさなる）。 But 蓄積 can also can be good, like the compound interest or accumulated knowledge.

components: 紹 (acquaint) + 介 (introduce / intervene) = 紹介 (introduce )
description: introduce (someone or something to somebody else)

components: 木 (tree) + 綿 (cotton) + 豆腐 (tofu!) = 木綿豆腐 (firm tofu)

components: 総 (general　/ total) + 合 (to suit) = 総合 (overall/ integrated)
description: integrated, overall, total, general thing (not just a movie theater, but a whole entertainment complex: video games, a bar, karaoke, etc.)(general car service - not just fixing the engine but also fixing tires, detailing the paint job, etc.)

components: 総 (general　/ total) + 理 (reason) = 総理 (prime minister)
description: the Prime Minister (of Japan or any other country that still has one)

meaning: as a whole, XXX. In general .. . XXX
components: 総 (general　/ total) + 体 (body) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 総体的 (as a whole, XXX. In general .. . XXX)
総合 (overall/ integrated) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 総合的 (synthetic)

labels: PRE
description: PREFIX meaning, "total amount of xxx" (total score, total cholesterol, number of users)

components: 検 (investigate) + 索 (look up) = 検索 (internet search)
索 (look up) + 引 (pull) = 索引 (index)

components: 収 (get) + 納 (to supply) = 収納 (storage)
description: storage - similar to the word 倉庫 (そうこ）, but 収納 is in the same building: the broom closet at your fast food restaurant is 収納 , but the shack in your backyard is 倉庫.

components: 納 (to supply) + 入 (put/go in) = 納入 (deliver/pay)
labels: NP
description: to pay, supply or deliver - more formal than 配達（はいたう）

components: 気 (mood) + 紛 (ambiguous) = 気が紛れる (divert attention)
description: to divert one's attention from one's troubles

components: 絹 (silk) + 豆 (bean) + 腐 (rot) = 絹漉し豆腐 (wack tofu)
description: the soft tofu (AKA the wrong kind)

labels: PRE
description: SUFFIX meaning, belonging to the tribe of XXX. like 'visual kei' uses this kanji. Other common tribes, akiba-kei, furugi-kei (vintage clothes fanatics), and elvis-kei. I mean, probably.

components: 日 (sun, day) + 系 (group, tribe) = 日系 (of Japanese descent)
description: 'of Japanese descent'. Nikkei American is Japanese American. But you can be nikkei Brazilian or nikkei Azerbaijani too!

components: 太陽 (the fucking sun!) + 系 (group, tribe) = 太陽系 (solar system)
体 (body) + 系 (group, tribe) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 体系的 (systematic)
description: systematic, and logical,like how dungeons and dragons takes all human attributes and assigns them a number.

components: 子 (child) + 孫 (grandchild) = 子孫 (descendant)
干 (dry out) + 渉 (interfere) = 干渉 (interfere or meddle.)
梅 (plum) + 干 (dry out) = 梅干 (pickled plums)

description: pickled plums! Oddly, they don't use the kanji for pickle.(漬). that would make too much sense.

components: 月 (moon) + 刊 (edition) = 月刊 (monthly)
肝 (liver) + 臓 (internal organ) = 肝臓 (liver)
焼 (roast / grill) + 芋 (potato) = 焼き芋 (roast potatoes)
labels: KANA
description: roast potatoes, a common thing sold at outdoor food carts.

meaning: to be stank because you sweat.
components: 汗 (sweat) + 臭 (stinky and dumb xxx!) = 汗臭い (to be stank because you sweat.)
宇宙 (outer space) + 人 (person) = 宇宙人 (alien)
宇 (cosmos) + 宙 (space) = 宇宙 (outer space)
休 (rest) + 憩 (break at work) = 休憩 (break-time)
description: break at work OR break from studying/training. Just long enough to eat some food and stretch - usually 15 minutes to an hour. .

components: 批 (call bullshit on) + 判 (judgement) = 批判 (criticism)
description: criticism, like "I call bullshit on the government!" or "I call bullshit on your opinion of an athlete!"

components: 判 (judgement) + 断 (decision/judgement/refuse) = 判断 (judge)
description: to judge, to deliver a verdict - but also judge like 'I wouldn't wear that skirt if I was her.'

components: 判 (judgement) + 子 (child) = 判子 (seal)
labels: KUN ON
description: The little stamps that people here use instead of signatures on official documents.

components: 評 (art or literary criticism) + 判 (judgement) = 評判 (reputation)
同 (same) + 伴 (accompany) = 同伴 (accompany)
labels: NP
description:
Accompany. This is like 伴う（ともなう）、but

a) limited to people , not situations.

b) it's more formal than 伴う. You'll see 同伴 on signs like, "Persons under 18 must be accompanied by a parent to this film," and things like that.

components: 評 (art or literary criticism) + 価 (value) = 評価 (price estimate)
description: estimate the price of something, jewels, comic books, etc.

components: 評 (art or literary criticism) + 論 (make a case for) = 評論 (critique)
labels: NP
description: critique of an entire genre. More often literary (novels, plays, poems) Usually used as a noun. Art Critic: 評論者　（ひょうろんしゃ）。

components: 批 (call bullshit on) + 評 (art or literary criticism) = 批評 (review )
labels: NP
description: review of one specific performance (showbiz event, exhibition, play, etc.) More commonly used as a verb.

components: 呼 (call to someone) + 吸 (suck) = 呼吸 (respiration)
labels: NP
description: Doctors' word for breathing. (most people just say 息（いき））

components: 大 (big) + 量 (quantity) = 大量 (a huge amount)
description: a huge amount, a big-ass quantity

meaning: a childrens' story or fairy tale
components: 童 (kid) + 話 (conversation) = 童話 (a childrens' story or fairy tale)
童 (kid) + 貞 (chastity) = 童貞 (male virgin)
description: male virgin. BOOBOO: You'd think that female virgin would also use this kanji, but no. A lady with a hymen is a 処女。- 'managed woman.' Oh snapppppz!!!

components: 児 (baby) + 童 (kid) = 児童 (children)
labels: NP
description: children - usually this word is found on signs like "children's room of the library" or "child services" or "daycare room"

components: 埋 (bury) + 合 (to suit) = 埋め合わせ (compensate for,)
description: to compensate for, as in, "He got a SUV to compensate for having a small cock."　（used like this: ｘｘｘ産め合わせ　として、ｙｙｙ！）

components: 坊 (boy / monk) + 主 (master/mainly) = 坊主 (Buddhist priest)
labels: ABU
description: kind of a disrespectful word for a Buddhist priest - like calling a catholic Father, "Hey, Pops!" . . . but for a young boy whose real name you don't know, it's a totally appropriate nickname. Weeeird.

components: 吐 (puke) + 気 (mood) = 吐き気 (nausea)
labels: FP

components: 意 (meaning) + 志 (intention, volition) = 意志 (will or volition)
description: will or volition (as in, willpower, against his will, etc.)

components: 闘 (struggle) + 志 (intention, volition) = 闘志 (fightin' spirit)
description: fightin' spirit, pluck, moxie, NUTZ

components: 不 (un) + 吉 (good omen) = 不吉 (inauspicious, dark, ill-omened)
鼻 (nose) + 詰 (cram in) = 鼻詰まり (stuffy nose)
description: stuffy nose (literally, 'crammed nose'!)

components: 詰 (cram in) + 込 (get crowded) = 詰め込む (to cram, jam, pack. )
不 (un) + 孝 (filial piety) + 者 (professional) = 不孝者 (un-filial child!)
labels: KUN ON

components: 親 (parents/kindness) + 孝 (filial piety) + 行 (go) = 親孝行 (filial piety! )
labels: CCW KUN ON

components: 若 (young) + 者 (professional) = 若者 (young person)
labels: KUNKUN
description: young person - example of the kunyomi (もの） suffix

labels: KUNKUN
description: dumb person - example of the kunyomi (もの) suffix.

components: 芸 (art) + 者 (professional) = 芸者 (geisha)
description: what Asian chicks in college get mad about

description: the way pretentious authors refer to themselves in the book: "As this author has said before, blah blah blah."

components: 著 (author) + 作 (make) + 権 (rights) = 著作権 (copyright)

labels: PRE
description: PREFIX meaning 'various XXX' (usually used with countries, opinions, factions, problems ,etc.) (pretty much the same as the '々' kanji)

components: 警察 (police) + 署 (government office) = 警察署 (police station)
消 (erase) + 防 (ward off) + 署 (government office) = 消防署 (fire station)

labels: NP
description: to sign an official document.(this sounds useless, but if you go to do any paperwork with the immigration people, they'll give you a form with this word on it)

components: 蒸 (humid) + 暑 (hot place) = 蒸し暑い (humid)
煮 (simmer/stew) + 物 (animal / thing) = 煮物 (boiled food)
labels: KUNKUN

components: 無 (without) + 料 (ingredients / fees) = 無料 (free)
description: free (not like Martin Luther King, I mean free like a free magazine full of articles on how to become a stripper)

components: 無 (without) + 理 (reason) = 無理 (impossible)

meaning: to ignore or snub someone or something.
components: 無 (without) + 視 (peer at) = 無視 (to ignore or snub someone or something.)
無 (without) + 駄 (bad quality) = 無駄 (waste )
labels: 1/2 KANA
description: a waste of something (time, money)

components: 維 (upkeep) + 持 (hold) = 維持 (ｍａｉｎｔａｉｎ　ｏｒ　ｓｕｓｔａｉｎ)

to maintain or sustain something

(the quality of our products, our 10% lead in the polls, maintaining the giant robot takes 3 hours a day)

components: 維持 (ｍａｉｎｔａｉｎ　ｏｒ　ｓｕｓｔａｉｎ) + 費 (expenses) = 維持費 (maintenance costs.)
labels: NP

components: 唯 (sole or only) + 一 (one) = 唯一 (the only, the sole XXX)

description: someone (related word: 誰かさん＝ Old What's-His-Face)

components: 準 (prepare / criteria) + 備 (furnish) = 準備 (get ready)
description: this is the main word you'll use with this kanji: prepare (packing for a vacation, getting the restaurant ready to open for the day, and putting on makeup are all junbi).

components: 基 (basis) + 準 (prepare / criteria) = 基準 (a standard )
description: criterion - the basis for judging a sex partner, potential job applicant, which songs to buy, etc. Also - unlike the OTHER きじゅん （規準）、THIS きじゅん ALSO has a second meaning: 'standard', as in, standard wages, standard price, the gold standard, standard medical ethics. Metric is our standard of measurement in Japan, whereas in USA they use their own standard.

components: 規 (criteria) + 準 (prepare / criteria) = 規準 (a criterion)

description: nurse - whether male or female

components: 弁 (dialect) + 護 (defend) + 士 (samurai radical) = 弁護士 (Defense attorney)
description: Defense attorney (BOOBOO: it's often translated as 'lawyer,' but べんごし usually handle criminal cases - murder, arson, etc. Lawsuits or legal procedures related to your visa are either handled by a sort of freelance bureaucrat/notary or by the mob. )

components: 保 (guarantee/maintain ) + 護 (defend) = 保護 (conserve, protect)

conserve, protect : used about protecting nature and the environment. But usually used with police protection (for snitches) or if you're escorting a lost child or drunk to the police box.

(BOOBOO: conservative person is　保守的な　（ほしゅてきな）　人)

components: 護 (defend) + 衛 (defense) = 護衛 (a bodyguard, an escort)

labels: PRE
description: PREFIX meaning 'female animal.' For example, 雌犬(めすいぬ) female dog - which does NOT mean 'beyatch' in the English sexist sense.

components: 肯 (consent) + 定 (plan) = 肯定 (affirm)
labels: NP
description: to admit to, or affirm something. (opp: 否定　（ひてい）meaning, to deny)

components: 交 (combine) + 渉 (interfere) = 交渉 (negotiate )
催 (sponsor) + 促 (peer pressure) = 催促 (repeatedly request)
description: to repeat and repeat a demand. Can be used about corporations (This is your 3d notice of overdue library book) or between frends, ('I keep asking you to repay that $5 I lent you')

components: 是 (fer shure) + 非 (injustice / mistake) = 是非 (absolutely!)
labels: 1/2 KANA
description:
this has 2 meanings:

1) in casual conversation, starting a sentence with 'zehi' means, 'Absolutely!' 'I'll get it done by hook or by crook!' - also, you'll hear 'ぜひおねがいします！' a lot, which means 'Thanks in advance for this favor.' . . . .

2) the propriety or morality of a certain course of action ( the kanji themselves translate to 'right + injustice').

reading: うんてんめんきょしょ
components: 運転 (drive a vehicle) + 免許 (license) + 証 (proof) = 運転免許証 (drivers' license)
証 (proof) + 拠 (evidence which is the basis for a judgment) = 証拠 (physical evidence)
labels: FP NP
description: physical evidence, such as a footprint, or "This green tap-water is evidence of pollution." Also this is the word one uses about evidence at trials, not 証.

components: 証 (proof) + 明 (bright) + 書 (write) = 証明書 (legal certification)
description: a legal document certifying something: that you're married, that you have a job, that you paid tax, that you ...

labels: PRE 1/2 KANA

components: 超 (exceed/ go over) + 自 (my own) + 然 (nature) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 超自然的 (supernatural)
言 (say) + 訳 (reason / translation) = 言い訳 (excuse)
description: excuse, as in, 'But my mom's not fat, she's just big-boned.' (actually, she IS, often, but not in the way you meant it)
translate. sometimes shortened to 訳す (yakusu)

components: 申 (humbly say) + 訳 (reason / translation) = 申し訳ない (sorry'n shit)
labels: F
description: really really really sorry. That your mom got big-boned.

components: 通 (pass) + 訳 (reason / translation) = 通訳 (simultaneous translation)
labels: KUNKUN
description: language interpretation, like at the United Nations.- where they listen in one language and talk into a microphone in another language, translating in real-time

components: 選 (choose) + 択 (select) = 選択 (to choose)
labels: F
description: choice- somewhat more formal than 選ぶ - you'd 選ぶ a bagel but 選択 a President.

components: 推 (infer) + 測 (scientific measurment) = 推測 (speculate.)
labels: NP
description: speculate. Kind of formal: "It's too early to speculate about the economy." "Scientists speculate that..."

components: 推 (infer) + 定 (plan) = 推定 (estimate)
labels: NP
description: a guess, an estimate (i.e. estimate the price of a repair)

components: 推 (infer) + 理 (reason) = 推理 (deductive reasoning, inference.)
提 (submit a proposal) + 案 (guide/proposal) = 提案 (proposal)
description: a proposal - not just in business but also in everyday life : "Let's go to this movie!"

components: 提 (submit a proposal) + 出 (pull out / hand over) = 提出 (hand over / present)
description: to physically present or submit (a report, a document)

components: 酔 (drunk) + 払 (pay) = 酔っ払い (drunk)
labels: SARC
description: drunk (literally, 'paying for one's drink'!)

components: 払 (pay) + 戻 (return) = 払い戻す (refund)
description: give me my money back, you shystey douchetool.

components: 指 (finger / point at) + 摘 (pluck) = 指摘 (To point out a shortcoming)
description: To point out a shortcoming - You can use it about your friends. Or "The critic pointed out the shortcomings of the play."

components: 人 (person) + 差 (discriminate) + 指 (finger / point at) = 人差し指 (index finger)
description: index finger (literally, "the people-pointing finger")

components: 招 (beckon) + 待 (wait) = 招待 (invite)
誘 (invite / entice) + 拐 (kidnap) = 誘拐 (kidnapping)
担 (carry on your back) + 当 (hit the target) = 担当 (be responsible for)
description: to be in charge of; to be responsible for

components: 負 (lose) + 担 (carry on your back) = 負担 (financial responsibility)
description: a responsibility, usually financial, which is declared by a system. "If a guest falls off the hotel roof, it's the hotel's responsibility." "The parent is responsible for paying for the child's lunch at boarding school."

components: 間 (a period of time) + 接 (directly contact) = 間接 (indirect)
labels: CCW
description: indirect, as in the Japanese famous for communicating indirectly.

meaning: interview with xxx  (usually a job interview, not a celebrity interview)
components: 面 (front surface / face) + 接 (directly contact) = 面接 (interview with xxx (usually a job interview, not a celebrity interview))
拍 (clap) + 手 (hand) = 拍手 (applaud)
拍 (clap) + 子 (child) = 拍子 (a meter)
description: a meter, or time signature. (i.e. a rock song which is in 4, a waltz in3, or some prog tune in 11/7)

components: 挿 (insert) + 入 (put/go in) = 挿入 (to insert)
description: to insert . . . .in your Dad. Ha-! You thought I was going to say your Mom. Nope, it's your dad. Gotcha! But seriously, he's taking a pounding. But it’s not always a dirty word. Insert a cd into the disk drive. That uses 挿入 also.

components: 看 (observe/guard) + 板 (plank) = 看板 (store sign)
description: store sign, signboard, billboard

components: 撮 (photo-shoot) + 影 (shadow) = 撮影 (a photoshoot or movie shoot.)
盗 (steal by stealth) + 撮 (photo-shoot) = 盗撮 (hidden camera)
description: take a sneak picture, usually of a woman dropping a deuce in a public restroom. Also known as 'ninjashotting.'

components: 撮影 (a photoshoot or movie shoot.) + 禁止 (forbidden) = 撮影禁止 (no photos!)
labels: NP

components: 悪 (bad) + 趣味 (hobby) = 悪趣味 (bad habit)

description: to embarrass one's self. (You can't say this about yourself, in the manner of, "OH! I fucked up!" But you can say はじをかいた! to someone else, like a mother scolding a child who doesn't know it's impolite to yell "POOOPY POOOPY!")

components: 恥 (disgrace) + 知 (know) = 恥知らず (shameless)
description: shameless (literally, "Not knowing the meaning of shame")

meaning: something which someone has taken the trouble to do
components: 折 (fold) + 角 (horn/corner) = 折角 (something which someone has taken the trouble to do)
labels: 1/2 KANA
description: something which someone has taken the trouble to do for you. Like a 折角 rhubarb pie that you have to eat even though you are allergic to fucking rhubarb.

components: 砂 (sand) + 丘 (hill) = 砂丘 (sand dune)
labels: NEO

components: 哲 (philosophy) + 学 (knowledge) = 哲学 (philosophy)
description: philosophy (adj.: 哲学的な、てつがくてきな）

components: 哲学 (philosophy) + 者 (professional) = 哲学者 (philosopher)
告 (inform) + 訴 (accuse) = 告訴 (an accusation, a charge)
一 (one) + 筋 (muscle) = 一筋 (single-mindedly, intently)
labels: KUNKUN

components: 昨 (yesterday) + (the beautiful sights of xxx) = 昨 XXX (last - xxx)
labels: PRE NP
description: last month, last year, etc.

components: 圧 (pressure) + 迫 (press upon) = 圧迫 (pressure)
description: pressure (圧迫な ＝ overpowering)

components: 迫 (press upon) + 害 (damage) = 迫害 (persecution)
description: persecution of a minority group (political word)

components: 申 (humbly say) + 込 (get crowded) = 申し込む (application)
description: an application (for a loan or to go to college, etc)

components: 人 (person) + 込 (get crowded) = 人込み (crowd of people)
description: a crowd of people- (BOOBOO : not necessarily all people doing the same thing(i.e. 'the crowd at the Sinatra show'). It means 'crowds in general,' as in, 'It gets crowded after 4 PM.' )

components: 配 (distribute) + 達 (plural/delivery) = 配達 (deliver)
description: to deliver. Used about business - used when money changes hands. Deliver by truck or UPS or FEDEX.

labels: SUF
description:
SUFFIX, meaning "more than one of XXX."But unlike English, you can't pluralize just any word.

In fact 90% of the time you'll see 達, it's in one of these 3 situations: 1) 仲間達：なかまたち：　the group of friends. 2) 人達：ひとたち： people, and 3) 子供達：こどもたち： the children.

components: 達 (plural/delivery) + 人 (person) = 達人 (master of xxx)
前 (before) + 述 (refer to) = 前述 (the aforesaid, the aforementioned)
labels: NP

components: 記 (diary) + 述 (refer to) = 記述 (give an in-depth account of)
description: to describe, to give an in-depth account of. Generally means an entire chapter, if not a whole book.

components: 分 (understand / divide / minute) + 析 (analyze) = 分析 (analyze)
刺 (stab / buisness card) + 激 (intense) = 刺激 (stimulate)
description: stimulate something - a chemical reaction, a clitoris, whatever. (v) ;a stimulus (n)

components: 募 (recruit) + 集中 (to concentrate) = 募集中 (now hiring)
description: you'll see this sign a lot. It means 'now hiring!'

components: 集 (collect) + 中 (middle) = 集中 (to concentrate)
編 (knit) + 集 (collect) = 編集 (to edit. )
description: to edit. (editor:編集者 (へんしゅうしゃ）)

components: 本 (book / the real) + 棚 (shelf) = 本棚 (bookcase )
labels: KUNKUN
description: a whole bookcase (BOOBOO: 'tana'　（棚） by itself means an individual shelf of a hondana)

components: 相 (partner) + 撲 (eradicate) = 相撲 (Sumo)
labels: CCW FP
description: Sumo. I've seen a bunch of of straight porn featuring 'sexy sumo wrestler girls,' but I've been unable to find a single gay sumo porn. Which either means, a) gay dudes think sumo are trolls, b) gay dudes have too much respect for the manliness of Sumo to do a x-rated parody, or c) gay dudes just jerk it to regular sumo on the tube for free.

components: 想 (idea/imagination) + 像 (statue / image) = 想像 (imagine)
description: imagine. (imaginative： そうぞうてきな)

components: 感 (feeling) + 想 (idea/imagination) = 感想 (impression)
description:
an impression of something. (like 印象, but you'd never use 感想 to mean 'first impression')

感想 includes both a factual summary of the thing as well as one's opinion of it . . .Often used in the phrase　感想文：かんそうぶん： a high-school book report.

components: 連 (take with / inform of) + 想 (idea/imagination) = 連想 (mental association)
description:
to mentally associate XXX with YYY. Like your psychologist says, "Let's play a word-association game."

"Manteca"

"Yo Mama."

components: 禁 (prohibition) + 煙 (smoky) = 禁煙 (no smoking)
禁 (prohibition) + 止 (stop) = 禁止 (forbidden)
description: forbidden by law. Common examples: smoking outdoors, parking your bike here, opening this door, busking on the street, breathing on a grandpa.

components: 立 (stand up) + 入 (put/go in) + 禁 (prohibition) + 止 (stop) = 立ち入り禁止 (no entry)
labels: NP
description: do not cross this line, no entry.

components: 厳 (strict) + 禁 (prohibition) = 厳禁 (strictly forbidden. )
効果 (an effect) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 効果的 (effective)
効 (effective) + 果 (fruit　/ result) = 効果 (an effect)
果 (fruit　/ result) + 物 (animal / thing) = 果物 (fruit)
labels: KUNKUN NP
description: fruit. You might see this on signs, but in conversation, most people say フルーツ。

components: 課 (section or lesson) + 長 (long / boss) = 課長 (section chief)
description: section chief - or department manager.

components: 課 (section or lesson) + 題 (topic) = 課題 (the task at hand)
description: The subject of today's lesson (in school); the task at hand (at work)

components: 菓 (sweets/pastry) + 子 (child) = 菓子 (pastries)
description: pastries, cupcakes, etc. - also called "sweets" in Japanese-English. (BOOBOO:Not candy bars.)

components: 訓 (kunyomi) + 練 (practice) = 訓練 (training)
description: training - more serious than 練習； more like for the army or kung fu

components: 洗 (wash) + 練 (practice) = 洗練された (sophisticated)
description: senrensareta - literally 'polished.' Like the 'after' version of Eliza Doolittle - rich but also well-mannered. Not like Paris Hilton. I guess 'cosmopolitan sophisticate' is the best English equivalent. Also applies to hi-class things that have been made in a very skillful way.

components: 一 (one) + 杯 (one cup of liquid) = 一杯 (one cup-full)
labels: KANA COUNTER

components: 乾 (dessicate) + 杯 (one cup of liquid) = 乾杯 (Skoal!)
description: Cheers! Let's drink!

components: 保 (guarantee/maintain ) + 証 (proof) = 保証 (guarantee)
健康 (health) + 保険 (insurance) = 健康保険 (health insurance)
保証 (guarantee) + 人 (person) = 保証人 (a guarantor)
description: a guarantor. This may not sound like a useful word to know, but if you ever come to Nippon, you'll need a Japanese guarantor. For pretty much everything- getting an apartment, a visa, etc. Usually it's your boss. So if you lose your job, your boss can kick you out of your house AND the country. It's a sort of share-cropper system!

components: 繰 (spin) + 返 (return or respond) = 繰り返し (to repeat over and over.)
操 (manipulate/ chastity) + 作 (make) = 操作 (operate)
labels: FP
description: control or operate - usually a machine, but can also be used about politicians controlling the people.

components: 体 (body) + 操 (manipulate/ chastity) = 体操 (gymnastics)
汚 (dirty) + 染 (dye) = 汚染 (pollution/contamination)
description: pollution OR contamination. (BOOBOO : If you want to say "environmental pollution," you have to use 汚染、　not 公害。)

components: 秘 (secret) + 密 (hard to see) = 秘密 (a secret)
便 (convenient　/ poop) + 秘 (secret) = 便秘 (constipation)

labels: COUNTER
description: xxx-seconds of time

components: 移 (transfer) + 植 (plant) = 移植 (organ transplant)
移 (transfer) + 民 (folk) = 移民 (immigrant )
description:
immigrant (only applies to people who became Japanese citizens and generally their families live here for generations)(i.e. not you)

Countries like America, UK, or Brazil are 移民国　（いみんこく- immigrant countries), built by immigrants. Japan, like most of the world, still thinks of citizenship as blood and DNA.

So if you're coming from the USA, remember your open-minded point-of-view is a small minority!

components: 便 (convenient　/ poop) + 利 (handy) = 便利 (handy, convenient)
利 (handy) + 益 (profit) = 利益 (profit)
description: profit (both literal and figurative)

components: 季 (season) + 節 (season / joint) = 季節 (season)
香 (good smell) + 港 (harbor) = 香港 (Hong Kong)
labels: FP

components: 哀 (pitiful) + 愁 (sorrow) = 哀愁 (melancholy)
labels: NP
description: an archaic, literary word meaning, "melancholy, pathos, grief." (used about a novel, song, movie, or tone of voice, but not about a person).

components: 郷 (one's hometown) + 愁 (sorrow) = 郷愁 (nostalgia)
labels: NP
description: literary word for nostalgia (BOOBOO: most people just say 懐かしい　（なつかしい！）)

components: 未 (not yet) + 来 (come/future) = 未来 (future)
description: future (未来時制　(未来じせい）＝the future tense)

components: 未 (not yet) + 成 (become) + 年 (year) = 未成年 (legal minor)
未 (not yet) + 遂 (attain) = 未遂 (attempted xxx)
description: attempted xxx (murder, suicide, kidnapping, etc.)

components: 道 (street) + 迷 (perplexed) = 道に迷う (get lost.)
迷 (perplexed) + 子 (child) = 迷子 (lost child)
labels: FP

components: 迷 (perplexed) + 路 (road) = 迷路 (maze)
診 (diagnose) + 断 (decision/judgement/refuse) = 診断 (diagnosis)
description: diagnosis (診断する＝to diagnose)

components: 油 (oil) + 断 (decision/judgement/refuse) = 油断 (let down your guard.)
跡 (vestiges) + 継 (succeed / inherit) = 跡継ぎ (heir/heiress)
description: an inheritor, an heir, heiress

components: 継 (succeed / inherit) + 続 (continue) = 継続 (to carry on)
description: to carry on (the family business / a tradition)

components: 純 (epitome) + 粋 (essence) = 純粋 (essence)
description: the essence of something. Pure pleasure! Pure blood! Pure honor!

components: 粒 (grain) + 子 (child) = 粒子 (atomic particle.)
description: an atomic particle, as in 'particle physics.'

components: 花 (flower) + 粉 (powder) + 症 (symptom) = 花粉症 (hay fever)
審 (judge) + 査 (inspect) = 審査 (investigation, judging)
description: to judge or examine something - anything from Charles Manson's trial to American Idol. Anything with a panel of judges. Also when the fire marshal or the IRS comes to do an Official Inspection.

labels: FR FP
description: wife (used about my own wife as well as your wife) (literally,'back of the house person' - OH SNAAAAAP!!)

components: 年 (year) + 寄 (get close) = 年寄り (old person)
labels: NP
description: old person ('70s and up). This isn't rude per se, but if you want to dismiss or belittle what an old fart just said, this is the word you use.

labels: SUF
description: SUFFIX meaning 'XXX and therefore dumb.' 古臭い　（ふるくさい) is one example　（so out of fashion that it is stinking) , also '田舎くさい　（いなくさい）' - meaning like 'stoopid redneck.'

components: 興 (interest) + 奮 (get worked up) = 興奮 (get excited)
description: to get all excited and freak out. to get really worked up. Not in a bad way. Like when you wet your pants after seeing n'sync.

components: 楽 (enjoy) + 器 (instrument) = 楽器 (musical instrument)
兵 (soldier) + 器 (instrument) = 兵器 (arms)
description: arms: unlike the related term 武器(ぶき）, 兵器 generally means things that are very modern and big: bazookas, missiles, rocket launchers, howitzers.

components: 器 (instrument) + 用 (utilize) = 器用 (dexterous)
description: skillful, dexterous. Like a kung-fu fighter that can jump around and not get kicked, or a pianist who plays hella difficult pieces without any fucked notes. There is also an implication that the person can improvise!

components: 突 (thrust) + 然 (nature) = 突然 (suddenly!)
description: suddenly! Like 急に, but you can also use 突然 if you're sending someone an unexpected mail, or making a last-minute plan.

components: 衝 (collision) + 突 (thrust) = 衝突 (impact / conflict)
description: means impact (car crash) but also a conflict (India and Pakistan are on a collision course) or mental conflict (his communism conflicts with his love for the sexy CIA agent).

components: 英 (heroic) + 雄 (male animal or hero) = 英雄 (hero)
description: hero of an adventure story or legend - (BOOBOO: it's different from the word for 'main character' (主人公(しゅじんこう）） which can be used in any kind of story.

components: 降 (descend /rainfall / get out of vehicle ) + 伏 (lay face down) = 降伏 (surrender)
description: surrender - unlike the more casual 降参　（こうさん）, 降伏 is used when you, like, lose a war.

components: 沈 (sink) + 黙 (shut up) = 沈黙 (bad kind of silence)
description: silence. (BOOBOO: not to be confused with 静か　（しずか）).　静か means a quiet place. 沈黙 is like a awkward hush that falls over the crowd when your mom's g-string fell off at the superbowl.

labels: KANA
description: to silently do xxx.

components: 不 (un) + 燃 (burn) = 不燃ゴミ (unburnable garbage)
痴 (molester) + 漢 (Chinese) = 痴漢 (train pervert)
labels: FR 1/2 KANA
description:
Usually 漢 means Chinese: it's used in a lot of obscure words ('Chinese dictionary,' 'Chinese herbal medicine,' 'Chinese classical literature,' etc.)

HOWEVER - aside from 漢字 - the only time 漢 is really used in daily life is here: 痴漢, meaning a guy who molests or gropes women on crowded trains.

So the literal reading is: 'sick Chinese' !WTF???

meaning: to criticize someone for no reason, just to nag at them.
components: 非 (injustice / mistake) + 難 (difficult) = 非難 (to criticize someone for no reason, just to nag at them.)
困 (trouble) + 難 (difficult) = 困難 (hardship)
labels: NP
description: a hardship, big trouble. Not like "Oh, If I fail this test, I'm going to be in big trouble!" こんなん is more like an ongoing hardship, like your parents died when you were young and you had to put yourself through school while working 20 hours a week washing dishes. Also often used in this phrase: 困難の時代 (troubled times)

components: 通 (pass) + 勤 (be employed at) = 通勤 (commute)
驚 (astonish) + 嘆 (lament, sigh) = 驚嘆 (amazemenｔ)
description: amazement, slack-jawed wonder

components: 模 (model) + 様 (important person) = 模様 (pattern)
labels: 1/2 KANA
description: a pattern which does not have pictures: fractals , mandala, plaid, zeebra skin. wood. do NOT use about representational patterns like flower-print or kids’ pajamas with horsies on them. 模様 also has a more formal meaning: ‘the details of an incident’ : You might hear a train/airport announcement which says "We will explain the details of the delay" ( 遅れるの模様。 )

components: 模 (model) + 型 (type / proper way) = 模型 (plastic model)
description: a model (this is literal! Model, like a snap-tite model car or model train)

components: 模 (model) + 範 (standard / the best way to do) = 模範 (model - prototype)
description: a model: Can be a person (a role model, a model sudent), or a thing (a model home, a model economy). (BOOBOO: Not model like a plastic model tank or gandam)

components: 墓 (grave) + 地 (area) = 墓地 (graveyard)
途 (on the way) + 方 (direction / method / person) + 暮 (make a living) = 途方に暮れる (be at a loss)
description: to be at a loss, to feel like WTF can I do??

components: 応 (react) + 募 (recruit) = 応募 (to apply for a job.)
字 (letter) + 幕 (curtain) = 字幕 (sub-titles)
labels: KUNKUN

components: 幕 (curtain) + 府 (government) = 幕府 (Shogun government)
labels: FP
description: most people in the West called the Shogun government "feudalism", but the shoguns themselves called it BAKUFU。

components: 砂 (sand) + 漠 (desert) = 砂漠 (desert )
漠 (desert) + 然 (nature) = 漠然とした (vague)
description: vague, obscure: unlike the related term 紛らわしい　（まぎらわしい）、漠然 isn't intentionally misleading - it has more the sense of a vague old memory you can't picture clearly even if you try.

components: 恩 (kindness) + 恵 (do a favor) = 恩恵 (favor)
description: favor. Unlike the very personal "恩", giving and receiving 恩恵 is a more businesslike form of gratitude: 恩恵を受ける means "to recieve a favor." A sort of I'll-scratch-your-back-if-you-scratch-mine practicality.

components: 恩 (kindness) + 知 (know) = 恩知らず (ingrate)
description: ｉｎｇｒａｔｅ (literally, 'unaware of gratitude.')

components: 細 (slender) + 菌 (bacteria) = 細菌 (bacteria (regular word))

labels: 1/2 KANA KIDS
description: a germ (usually used as a kids' insult - an "EWW you're gross!" kind of word)

components: 囚 (prisoner) + 人 (person) = 囚人 (prisoner )
頑 (stubborn) + 固 (hard) = 頑固 (stubborn)
labels: 1/2 KANA

components: 個 (individual) + 人 (person) = 個人 (personal)
description: personal, single-serving (one-to-one session with a teacher, personal pizza)(BOOBOO: don't confuse this with private - private is こじんてきな 個人的な)

components: 一 (one) + 個 (individual) = 一個 (small thing)
labels: KUNKUN COUNTER
description: one small, usually roundish, thing - orange, apple, ipod

components: 個 (individual) + 室 (room suffix) = 個室 (private room)
雰 (atmosphere) + 囲 (surround) + 気 (mood) = 雰囲気 (atmosphere)
description: the atmosphere of a place (usually figurative!)

components: 範 (standard / the best way to do) + 囲 (surround) = 範囲 (extent, scope,)
description: the extent, range scope, or bounds (extent of the earthquake-damaged area, scope of the congressional inquiry, range of the birds' migrations).

components: 周 (circumference) + 囲 (surround) = 周囲 (perimeter)
description: perimeter, circumference

components: 国 (country) + 宝 (treasure) = 国宝 (national treasure.)
責 (condemn) + 任 (have responsibility for) = 責任 (responsibility)
妊 (pregnant) + 娠 (pregnancy) = 妊娠 (pregnant)
妊 (pregnant) + 婦 (housewife / lady) = 妊婦 (pregnant woman)
避 (avoid / dodge) + 妊 (pregnant) = 避妊 (birth control)
天 (heaven) + 皇 (emperor) = 天皇 (emperor)
labels: FP
description: emperor of Japan - never used about other countries. (BOOBOO: you don't say 天皇さん！　And you don't use his proper name - Hirohito or Akihito, either. You say, 天皇陛下　（てんのう　へいか) which means His Majesty The Emperor. If you want an easy-to-read book that really dishes all the dirt on the Emperor system, read YAMATO DYNASTY by Sterling Seagrave.

components: 皇 (emperor) + 帝 (foreign emperor) = 皇帝 (other country's emperor)
description: emperor - like China, not like Japan. (BOOBOO: Japan's emperor is 天皇:てんのう.)

components: 皇 (emperor) + 族 (family) = 皇族 (imperial family)
皇 (emperor) + 室 (room suffix) = 皇室 (imperial palace)
希 (request / uncommon) + 望 (desire) = 希望 (request)
description: A common-place, easily possible wish: "I'd like an aisle seat." "I'd like to fly nonstop."　希望 might be better translated as 'request': 'Customers wishing to request a child-seat for their infant please see the waiter.'

components: 神 (GOD kanji) + 聖 (holy) = 神聖 (holy)
聖 (holy) + 書 (write) = 聖書 (bible)
程 (extent) + 度 (times) = 程度 (a degree or extent)
過 (surpass / too much) + 程 (extent) = 過程 (a process)

labels: KUNKUN

components: 契 (contract) + 約 (promise/ roughly speaking) = 契約 (contract)
description: contract (one of the most hated words in the Japanese language)

components: 喫 (enjoy a drink and a smoke) + 煙 (smoky) = 喫煙 (smoking)
labels: NP
description: the act of smoking. You'll see this on signs a lot, meaning 'this is the smoking section.'

components: 清 (pure) + 潔 (honorable) = 清潔 (pure)
description: pure, clean, undiluted. More often used figuratively - about morals and such. Or ＊ahem＊ ethnicity.

components: 不 (un) + 潔 (honorable) = 不潔 (filthy)
電 (electricity) + 柱 (pillar) = 電柱 (telephone pole)
labels: NEO
description: telephone pole. Although, since in Japan all the telephone poles double as light poles (街灯) AND are festooned with every other imaginable cable to boot, I have no idea which word people use!

components: 駐 (stop at) + 車 (car) + 所 (area / attribute) = 駐車所 (parking lot.)
description: parking lot. Interestingly, there is no word for 'parking space,' in the sense of "Keep a lookout for a good space!"

components: 駐 (stop at) + 車 (car) + 禁止 (forbidden) = 駐車禁止 (no parking)
labels: NP

components: 公 (public) + 害 (damage) = 公害 (pollution.)
description: pollution. Has a more broad meaning than the related word 汚染（おせん）。 Not just dirty smoggy air, but also noise pollution, the annoyance of someone talking on a cellphone on a train, and 情報公害　（じょうほうこうがい）: "ad pollution" - the inescapable advertisements one sees everywhere. BOOBOO:If you want to say "environmental pollution," you have to use 汚染、　not 公害。

components: 被 (get injured) + 害 (damage) = 被害 (casualties)
description: damage (to property) or casualties (human): used about earthquakes, wars, and crimes.

components: 被害 (casualties) + 者 (professional) = 被害者 (victim)
labels: NP

components: 役 (role) + 割 (divide) = 役割 (role)
labels: KUNKUN
description:
role, but more general and figurative than just 役（やく）。 Gay dudes who are top or bottom - that's 役割。 If your role is 'the black sheep of the family," that's 役割。 The guy in the boy-band who is "the edgy one." The person on the reality -tv show who is "the crazy one."

The verb is 果たす（はたす）, as in XXX　の役割を果たす（ to play the role of XXX)

components: 一 (one) + 割 (divide) = 一割 (10 percent)
labels: COUNTER NOKURI

components: 素 (element) + 材 (raw materials) = 素材 (raw material)
description: raw material - both literally and figuratively (as in, the raw data that you base your essay or report or novel on) ("I'm working on materal for my novel!")

components: 酸 (sour) + 素 (element) = 酸素 (oxygen.)
labels: FR
description: oxygen - which is kind of a Fucked Roots if you think about it - "sour element?" What have they got against oxygen?!? What SHOULD we be breathing?

components: 二 (two) + 酸 (sour) + 化 (transform) + 炭 (carbon) + 素 (element) = 二酸化 炭素 (carbon dioxide)
憲 (constitution) + 法 (law) = 憲法 (constitution)
請 (request) + 求 (demand/ask) = 請求 (claim, demand)
description: Usually used in business. On-demand service. A bill for services. When used with に、 it means, "According to the customer's request," or "According to her wishes."

components: 精 (spirit) + 神 (GOD kanji) = 精神 (spirit)
description: spirit- both in the sense of psychology and in the sense of religion. If you want to say "Samurai spirits!" this is the one you'll use.

components: 精 (spirit) + 一杯 (one cup-full) = 精一杯 (with all one's might)
精神 (spirit) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 精神的 (spiritual.)
感 (feeling) + 情 (emotion) = 感情 (a feeling, an emotion)
事 (action/ incident) + 情 (emotion) = 事情 (circumstances)
description:
circumstances. A euphemism for 'bad situation': crushing debt, mother is a prostitute, etc, in trouble with the mob, etc.

彼女、事情がありそうね。 (She looks like she comes from Circumstances, doesn't she?)

事情 also differs from other 'situation' words because it emphasizes the circumstances behind a person's actions. (i.e. the boss says, 'You were late to work again, but if you explain your situation, I might not punish you.')

meaning: affection : more than friendship and less than love.
components: 愛 (love) + 情 (emotion) = 愛情 (affection : more than friendship and less than love.)
表 (express) + 情 (emotion) = 表情 (facial expression)
description: facial expression - although most people say "XXXの顔をした”　（ｘｘｘのかおをした）, meaning "She made an xxx-face."

labels: SUF
description: SUFFIX which turns an adjective into a noun: possible+性=possibility. creative+性=creativity. 男性　＝ man, but 男性性＝ masculinity.

components: 姓 (family name) + 名 (name, famous) = 姓名 (full name)
description: one's full name - first and last names.

components: 株 (share, stock) + 式 (ritual) = 株式 (stocks)
labels: NP
description: This is the word used in financial terms about stocks IN GENERAL - IPO or 'go public' or 'stock amoritization' and the like

components: 対 (against) + 称 (symmetry) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 対称的 (symmetrical)
description: symmetrical (非対称的な　（ひたいしょうてきな = assymetrical!)
to become dry or arid (weather or place) ; to dry out or desiccate.

components: 中 (middle) + 毒 (poison/ addict) = 中毒 (addict)
有 (exist) + 毒 (poison/ addict) = 有毒 (toxic, poisonous)
毒 (poison/ addict) + 薬 (medicine) = 毒薬 (poison)
description: regular ,intentional poison- as opposed to toxic pollutants or drugs.

components: 梅 (plum) + 酒 (liquor) = 梅酒 (plum liquor)
labels: KUN ON

components: 後 (afterwards / behind) + 悔 (regret) = 後悔 (regret)
labels: FP
description: the most general, broad, useful word for regret

components: 侮 (despise) + 辱 (humiliate) = 侮辱 (insult)
description: to insult (to be insulted : 侮辱を受ける　（ぶじょくをうける）)

components: 忠 (loyalty) + 実 (truth) = 忠実 (faithful)
description: someone who is faithful in doing his/her duties. Also means like a movie which is faithful to the book, or a translation which is faithful to the original. Or even a forgery which copies the original dollar bill completely well.

components: 忠 (loyalty) + 告 (inform) = 忠告 (admonish)
description: admonishing negative advice: "Don't open that door!" "Don't swim naked!"

components: 患 (medical patient) + 者 (professional) = 患者 (a patient)
description: a patient. Easy to remember because in California the かんじゃ can legally get ガンジャ.

components: 仲 (friendship) + 間 (a period of time) = 仲間 (friendship)
labels: KUNKUN
description:
friendship, OR membership in a group (i.e. working for the same company).

You'll also hear things like this: "The squid is the octopus' 仲間."

components: 騒 (make noise) + 音 (sound) = 騒音 (din)
description: din, discord

components: 所 (area / attribute) + 属 (genus/affiliation) = 所属 (to belong to a department)
description: to belong to such-and-such a department. "Hi! I'm Ross Henderson, from Marketing!"

components: 金 (gold) + 属 (genus/affiliation) = 金属 (metallic)
付 (stick to) + 属 (genus/affiliation) = 付属 (physically attached)
description: to be physically attached or part of a set. The bolts and nuts that come with an ikea furniture thing.

components: 隠 (hide) + 居 (live) = 隠居 (retire)
labels: FR FP
description: retire, retired person (Fucked Roots - retirement is cowardly? I see! I'll work for the Emperor until my arms fall off!)

components: 泥 (mud) + 棒 (pole) = 泥棒 (robber)
labels: KUNKUN 1/2 KANA
description: a robber - not like a mugger but like a break-into-your-house-when-you're-not-home guy

components: 泥 (mud) + 酔 (drunk) + 者 (professional) = 泥酔者 (shit-faced)
labels: SARC
description: someone who is shit-faced drunk (泥酔する： to BE shit-faced)

components: 夜 (late night) + 尿 (urine) + 症 (symptom) = 夜尿症 (bed-wetting)
description: the reason you hate doing your mom's laundry.

components: 尻 (butt) + 尾 (tail) = 尻尾 (tail)
labels: KANA FP

components: 桃 (peach) + 尻 (butt) = 桃尻 (rad booty)
labels: KUNKUN
description: a peach-shaped ass. This is considered the ideal feminine shape by Japanese people, since they don't have a lot to work with. Your mom's got a momoshiri, too- it's covered with fuzz.

components: 印 (stamp) + 刷 (print) = 印刷 (print)
description: the physical process of printing, as in printing press - not to be confused with 出版 (しゅっぱん＝publishing), which is an entire industry.

components: 短 (short / brief) + 所 (area / attribute) = 短所 (flaw )
description: weak point, flaw

components: 双 (pair) + 肩 (shoulder) = 双肩 (to bear on one's shoulders)
description: to bear a burden, a responsibility.

components: 肩 (shoulder) + 車 (car) = 肩車 (piggy-back ride)
labels: KUNKUN

components: 解 (solve / untie) + 雇 (hire) = 解雇 (to fire)
description: to fire (although mostly people just say, クビになった！ (literally: My throat was cut!))

components: 女 (woman) + 房 (wife/cluster) = 女房 (one's own wife)
labels: FR F
description: A somewhat formal term for one's own wife (FR： female cluster? What's that about!??)

components: 暖 (warm place) + 房 (wife/cluster) = 暖房 (heating)
description: heating : central heating, electric heater, an air-conditioner set to "heat," etc.

components: 尾 (tail) + 行 (go) = 尾行 (to tail)
labels: NEO
description: tail someone like a detective

components: 革 (leather/revolution) + 命 (life) = 革命 (revolution)
革命 (revolution) + 者 (professional) = 革命者 (a rebel)
甘 (sweet) + 見 (look) = 甘く見る (not take seriously)
description: to not take an opponent seriously because you assume they are soft.

PREFIX: you can put it before any noun, with no particles in between, for example:

某国： ぼうごく:a certain country,

某地：ぼうち： an undisclosed location,

某猿：　ぼうさる　:a certain monkey.

etc.

components: 無 (without) + 謀 (plot) = 無謀 (unpremeditated)
description: rash, impulsive, unpremeditated

components: 陰 (shady) + 謀 (plot) = 陰謀 (conspiracy )
寛 (leniency) + 大 (big) = 寛大 (lenient)
description: tolerant, broad-minded, gracious, lenient

components: 寛 (leniency) + 容 (appearance) = 寛容 (tolerance, leniency )
日 (sun, day) + 焼 (roast / grill) = 日焼け (sunburn)
labels: NEO

components: 環 (environment) + 境 (border) = 環境 (environment)
description: environment (like English, this is not limited to nature. A bad kid can be a "product of his environment.")

components: 国 (country) + 境 (border) = 国境 (national border)
境 (border) + 界 (the world) = 境界 (boundary)
description:
means border or boundary of property (80% the same usage as さかい　（境） , but a bit more formal).

BOTH 境　and 境界　are often used in the figurative sense - like "This film pushes the envelope of good taste" or "His art blurs the boundary between painting and sculpture".

Also used in science.

components: 表 (express) + 現 (present time) = 表現 (figure of speech)
description: figure of speech, expression

components: 克 (overcome) + 服 (clothes) = 克服 (conquer)
description: conquest, control, subjugation. But it can also mean, 'Recover from or overcome an obstacle.'

components: 状 (circumstance) + 況 (condition) = 状況 (context, condition)
description: the state of affairs, the condition, the context: どういう状況でその言葉を使う？ (どういう　じょうきょう　で　その　ことぼあ　を　つかう？ = In what situation do you use that word?)

components: 不 (un) + 況 (condition) = 不況 (recession)
description: economic slump or recession; Republican administration

components: 競 (contest) + 争 (battle) = 競争 (competition)
description: unless you're talking about a literal foot-race, 競争 does not mean a game. It refers to competing within a framework (usually business or academic). The best score on the test, the salesman who sold the most this month.

components: 憤 (get indignant) + 慨 (deplore) = 憤慨 (resentment, burning slow anger.)
貨 (cargo) + 物 (animal / thing) = 貨物 (cargo, freight)
貧 (poverty) + 乏 (shoddy) = 貧乏 (poor)
description: a broke motherfucker (can be used as a noun or adjective)

components: 貯 (save up) + 金 (gold) = 貯金 (savings)
description: savings.(BOOBOO: used only about money in the bank - not stocks or real estate investments)(

components: 品 (products) + 質 (quality) = 品質 (quality)
description: quality of merchandise　(品質のいい/品質の悪い）

components: 性 (sex / essential nature) + 質 (quality) = 性質 (essential nature)
description: natural quality. In contrast to 性格（せいかく）, 性質 applies to rocks and things as well as people and animals. Also it refers to the inner nature of people, rather than their social selves. So if you wanted to say that someone was very outgoing and loved sports and bars, you wouldn't use 性質. But if you wanted to say that someone was very stoic or honest, you would.

components: 家 (home) + 賃 (rent money) = 家賃 (rent money)
labels: FP

components: 賃 (rent money) + 貸 (lend) = 賃貸 (rental)
探 (look for) + 偵 (detective) = 探偵 (private detective)
description: BOOBOO: Most books say this means 'detective' but really it means private detective, not police. (police detective is 刑事　－けいじ）. There's a huge P.I. industry here - they have advertisements in all the magazines and even posters on walls on the street!

components: 損 (harm) + 害 (damage) = 損害 (damage)
description: damage - to your body, but also to your property. Often used when you lose money on a deal. Usually implies that the damage was not intentionally caused.

components: 規 (criteria) + 則 (rule) = 規則 (rule or regulation)
予 (beforehand) + 測 (scientific measurment) = 予測 (predict)
description: predict,forecast

components: 一 (one) + 貫 (pierce) = 一貫 (consistency)
description: to do something consistently all the way till it is done. (一貫性　（いっかんせい）= consistency)

components: 功 (success) + 績 (achievements) = 功績 (achievement)
description: an achievement or good deed

components: 成 (become) + 績 (achievements) = 成績 (ranking)
description: ranking of the results of a competition （i,e, the results of a test, a race, or when a hostess bar posts the framed pictures of their #1,2,and 3 earners outside the club on the marquee!)

components: 積 (pile up) + 極 (extreme) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 積極的 (active, enterprising)
description: (adjective): enterprising, (adverb) :positively, aggressively. Someone who is really active and getting shit done and having opinions and stuff.

components: 面 (front surface / face) + 積 (pile up) = 面積 (area)
description: area, like square meters.

components: 貴 (exalted) + 様 (important person) = 貴様 (fucknuts)
labels: SARC
description: fucknuts, douchebags.

components: 貴 (exalted) + 族 (family) = 貴族 (a noble)
description: a noble, that is to say, someone from a noble family.

components: 遺 (bequeath) + 産 (childbirth, production of things) = 遺産 (inheritance)
description: inheritance (but, sadly, you can't say 'isan suru' to mean 'inherit.'- you have to say 遺産を相続する　（いさん　を　　そうぞく　する））. . . .fuck!

components: 遺 (bequeath) + 伝 (transmit) + 子 (child) = 遺伝子 (gene)
description: a gene (heredity is 遺伝　（いでん))

components: 肌 (human skin) + 触 (touch) = 肌触り (texture)
description: the texture of something (i.e. how it feels when rubbed on your skin)

components: 感 (feeling) + 触 (touch) = 感触 (touch-sensation)
description: a physical sensation of touch, as in "I've lost all feeling in my left ball." Also can be used as "impression", as in, "What kind of feeling did you get from the interview? Do you think it went well?"
one after the other, in rapid succession

components: 手 (hand) + 続 (continue) = 手続き (procedure)
description: procedure (usually involving forms in triplicate and irritating bitchy secretaries)

components: 深 (deep) + 刻 (engrave) = 深刻 (grave situation)
description: the situation is grave, serious, and worsening. Used with something that was kind of ill to begin with, and if you don't act now it'll get much worse.
perfect, as in 'the perfect crime' or 'perfectly safe.' Also, perfect as in, 'My new project is perfectly complete, now the finishing touches are over.'

components: 完 (complete) + 全 (all) = 完全 (complete)
description: complete or total. "Don't stand up until the bus comes to a complete stop." Perfect victory: 100 to nothing. Not used about people, except for this idiom: 完全な人いない (nobody's perfect) 。 Also used when creating things. To perfect a new invention or complete a new artwork.

components: 投 (throw) + 票 (ballot) = 投票 (vote)
description: to vote (also, it can mean election, as in "Did he win the vote?")

components: 目 (eye) + 標 (sign, mark) = 目標 (eventual goal)
description:
A goal - usually not something you do all at once. Usually related to self-improvement in some way: "My goal is to learn French in 2 years."

"My goal is to run a marathon next July."

components: 標 (sign, mark) + 識 (be conscious) = 標識 (marked)
description: "marked", as in 'Obey the rules which have been posted on the wall', or 'Follow the marked trail', 'Follow the target kitty which has been tagged with a blue collar.'

components: 漂 (drift) + 流 (flow) = 漂流 (drifting)
日 (sun, day) + 本 (book / the real) + 酒 (liquor) = 日本酒 (Japanese booze)
description: Japanese-style booze, or what we in the west call Sake. (BOOBOO: In fact, to Japanese, any booze is Sake)

components: 飲 (drink) + 酒 (liquor) + 運転 (drive a vehicle) = 飲酒運転 (drunk driving)
labels: NEO

components: 価 (value) + 値 (price or ranking) = 価値 (merit)
description: merit or worth - not used about money (it's worth it for the view! The good part of Dancehall is the bass!)

components: 物 (animal / thing) + 価 (value) = 物価 (price)
labels: NP
description: price of commodities in general. (Tokyo prices are high! The bananna market took a hit as prices continued to fall!) An economist might use this word.

components: 価値 (merit) + 観 (point of view) = 価値観 (ｍｏｒａｌ　ｖａｌｕｅｓ)
description: ｏｎｅ’ｓ　ｍｏｒａｌ　ｖａｌｕｅｓ - used with specific things, like drinking, smoking, gambling.

components: 重 (heavy / overlap) + 要 (important) = 重要 (essential)
要 (important) + 求 (demand/ask) = 要求 (demand)
description: demand - more strident than the related word 求める　（もとめる）

components: 需 (demand) + 要 (important) = 需要 (demand)
labels: NP
description:
demand in the economic sense - supply and demand

This does NOT get to turn into a verb. You don't use する. You'd say 需要がある (there's a demand for xxx) or perhaps　　需要を　満たす　（じゅようをもたす） (there's enough of xxx to meet the demand).

components: 腰 (waist) + 抜 (extract) = 腰抜け (coward)
description: coward - the nuance is someone who becomes paralyzed when the shit goes down. Someone who is too frightened to react.

components: 材 (raw materials) + 料 (ingredients / fees) = 材料 (ingredients)
description: usually seen on the "ingredients" label on food packaging. But also used about source material for a report: field notes, raw data. The implication is that, unlike 素材, the source material is not totally raw, it's partially assembled --for instance, if you get silk, that's 素材, but when the silk is woven into a fabric, that is 材料, and then the fabric is an ingredient of a handbag.

components: 木 (tree) + 材 (raw materials) = 木材 (raw lumber)
夫 (husband) + 婦 (housewife / lady) = 夫婦 (married couple)
賛 (agree) + 成 (become) = 賛成 (agree/ support)
description: to agree with a statement - not just agree but also support, as in "Many people support this new law." "Most of the committe members support the chairman's fuckin' proposal." ( in this case, it is usually used about a great number of people, not just one individual)

components: 着 (wear / arrive) + 替 (substitute) = 着替え (a change of clothes)
潜 (lurk) + 在 (be real) + 意識 (awareness) = 潜在意識 (subconscious)
規 (criteria) + 律 (regulation) = 規律 (rules/discipline)
description: literally, "rule," but closer to the English word for "discipline."Rules typically say "don't do this or that," but 規律 give long lists of things you HAVE TO do, in the order you have to do them. Like if you're at military school, you have to get up at 5:30, have your bed made by 5:35, shine your shoes by 5:40, and report to the mess hall.

components: 精 (spirit) + 巣 (habitat) = 精巣 (balls)
labels: FR OBSOLETE
description: ：A very archaic word for ｔｅｓｔｉｃｌｅｓ！　Although you'll never use this, the roots are so awesome, I had to include it' the balls are apparently the 'spiritual habitat' of men.

components: 削 (whittle down) + 除 (exclude) = 削除 (delete)
description: delete (as in, delete a file, but also to eliminate or censor something)

components: 消 (erase) + 極 (extreme) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 消極的 (passive)
description: passive person who always is like, 'I dunno, what do YOU wanna do?' and never starts any new projects.

components: 消 (erase) + ム () = 消しゴム (eraser)
消 (erase) + 去 (past tense) = 消去 (to delete)
description: to delete (computer term) delete a file or folder. Also to eliminate, as in process of elimation. Elimination. Whatever, it's only a dictoinry. Dictionary. FUCK! More coffee.

components: 浮 (float) + 気 (mood) = 浮気 (affair)
labels: KUNKUN
description: cheating, having an affair　(can be used even if you're not married)

components: 浮 (float) + 人 (person) = 浮いてる人 (space cadet)
description: someone who is oblivious to social rules, not a rebel way, more like in a spaz way. - ういてるひと doesn't have any friends and sort of floats around on the periphery of society.

components: 妥 (compromise) + 当 (hit the target) = 妥当 (adequate)
description: means 'appropriate' - but more relaxed than related words like 適当 (てきとう)　and 正しい (ただしい). . .妥当 is more like "adequate."

components: 授 (instruct) + 業 (business) = 授業 (lesson)
教 (teach) + 授 (instruct) = 教授 (pedagogy)
labels: NP
description: the act of teaching： pedagogy, that's what I'm fucking talking about.

components: 採 (gather) + 用 (utilize) = 採用 (adopt)
description: adopt a policy or resolution
cutting down a tree. Logging.

components: 耐 (withstand) + 久 (been a long time) + 性 (sex / essential nature) = 耐久性 (durability)
labels: NP

meaning: each xxx in its own way.
labels: 1/2 KANA
description: each thing in its own way. 各々考え方が違います。 (everyone thinks in their own way/ everyone has their own opinion).

labels: PRE
description: PREFIX- you can put 各　in front of a noun to make it mean "each one, respectively"：each place, each thing, person.

components: 恋 (passion) + 愛 (love) = 恋愛 (love in general)
description: love or relationships in general - that is to say, if there's an ad for fortune-telling that says, "Test your luck in money! Love! and health!" it'll be using 恋愛. If there's an article in a womens' magazine, "How to get love in 10 steps!" it'll be using 恋愛. But you wouldn't tell a hot guy " I 恋愛 you very much!" See?

components: 落 (fall,drop) + 着 (wear / arrive) = 落ち着く (keep your cool.)
description: to keep your cool. Often said as a command： おちつけ!!

components: 堕 (corrupt) + 落 (fall,drop) = 堕落 (corrupt)
description: corrupt in one's personal life - not usually political corruption. Drugs, lies, trife behavior.

components: 部 (section) + 落 (fall,drop) + 民 (folk) = 部落民 (burakumin)
labels: ABU CCW FR
description:
(literally,'the fallen group.') this is - along with Ainu, Korean ex-slaves, the Eta-hin,and the handicapped, one of the main groups discriminated against in Japan. I won't go into the whole story here, but most Japanese will say, 'Don't say 部落民, it's 差別 (さべつ＝ discriminatory)'

What they neglect to tell you is, there is no polite word! Effectively denying someone a voice in the guise of being polite to them is a very. Very. VERY Japanese way of fucking with people.

However, you can say 同和 (どうわ = social integration) instead: speaking of the phenomenon instead of the individuals. For instance, discrimination against people is 同和の問題 ('the social integration problem').

A nice article explaining the importance of using the right language is here and a more general overview of discrimination is here.

components: 落 (fall,drop) + 第 (rank or number in series) = 落第 (fail a test)
description: fail an exam,or get held back a grade.

components: 性 (sex / essential nature) + 格 (character, aspect) = 性格 (personality)
合 (to suit) + 格 (character, aspect) = 合格 (pass test)
description: pass a test.(opposite： ふごうかく)

components: 略 (abbreviation) + 語 (language) = 略語 (abbreviation)
description: abbreviation or acronym, like CIA or SHIELD, NWA, or KRS ONE, BDP, CREAM, etc.

components: 道 (street) + 路 (road) = 道路 (road)
description: paved road - small or large

components: 条 (clause) + 件 (incident) = 条件 (condition)
description: condition, as in, "You gotta be Japanese to come in this club? Are you jokin'??""

article 9 of the constitution, which states that Japan can't have an army. Right? WRONG. Japan CAN have an army - they just aren't allowed to invade, an inconvinient fact that both pacifists AND right-wingers seem to forget.

components: 酸 (sour) + 性 (sex / essential nature) = 酸性 (acidity)
優 (kindhearted/excel) + 秀 (excel) = 優秀 (superior)

誘 (invite / entice) + 導 (lead) = 誘導 (lead)
description: to lead or conduct : A teacher leads the class on the field trip. The policewoman conducts traffic. The nuance is, 誘導 means literally going together with the people to the place.

components: 透 (transparent) + 明 (bright) = 透明 (transparent)
description: transparent (like water or glass)(BOOBOO: not to be confused with 'invisible', which is 目で見えない　（めでみえない））

components: 浸 (immerse) + 透 (transparent) = 浸透 (permeate)
description: to permeate (like mud permeating a towel); to stealthily take over (communism) ;　osmosis

components: 携 (carry in hand) + 帯 (belt) = 携帯 (cellphone)
初 (first time) + 級 (level) = 初級 (beginner-level)
階 (story of a building) + 級 (level) = 階級 (social class)
labels: NP
description: a rank, grade, class.(usually used in the sense of social class)

components: 平 (equal / level) + 穏 (tranquil) = 平穏 (tranquil)
description: quiet or tranquil place

components: 侵 (perpetrate) + 攻 (attack) = 侵攻 (invasion)
labels: NP

components: 侵 (perpetrate) + 入 (put/go in) = 侵入 (intrusion)
labels: NP
description: intrusion or infestation or - sometimes - interstitial or even good old 'entry!' If you're talking about intrusive, anxious thoughts that make it impossible to enjoy a sunny day, or whether you're talking about a burglar intruding into your home, or an infestation of maggots in a wound, or even if you're planning a particular point for a moon landing, しんにゅう is your boy. Holla!

labels: KUN ON

components: 急 (urgent) + 行 (go) = 急行 (express train)
緊 (tense) + 急 (urgent) = 緊急 (urgent)
主 (master/mainly) + 婦 (housewife / lady) = 主婦 (housewife)
labels: FR

components: 掃 (sweep) + 除 (exclude) = 掃除 (house-cleaning)
labels: FP 1/2 KANA
description: house-cleaning. Not just sweeping, but vacuuming, straightening up, smacking the futon, etc.

components: 帝 (foreign emperor) + 国 (country) = 帝国 (empire)
description: empire - in the literal, non-judgemental sense of 'having an emperor' (England, China, ancient Inca). I don't think 帝国 carries the bad nuance of 'imperialism' (i.e. warlike or colonialist).

components: 締 (tighten) + 切 (cut / important) = 締め切り (a deadline)
飛 (fly) + 躍 (jump) = 飛躍 (a leap)
description: a leap. Usually figurative. Make a leap forward in technology. Not used as a verb.

components: 跳 (leap up) + 躍 (jump) = 跳躍 (to jump horizontally)

components: 躍 (jump) + 進 (progress) = 躍進 (rapid progress)

洗 (wash) + 濯 (rinse) = 洗濯 (do laundry)
labels: 1/2 KANA

components: 洗濯 (do laundry) + 物 (animal / thing) = 洗濯物 (laundry )

components: 口 (mouth) + 紅 (dark lipstick red color) = 口紅 (lipstick)

components: 紅 (dark lipstick red color) + 葉 (leaf) = 紅葉 (fall colors)
labels: FP
description: fall colors; fall leaves

components: 巧 (adroit) + 操 (manipulate/ chastity) = 巧みに操る (handle a tool skillfully)
description: to handle a tool skillfully

components: 給 (provide) + 与 (bestow) = 給与 (salary, wages )
極 (extreme) + 端 (the edge) = 極端 (extreme)
description: extreme - Ｕsed about people, people who take things too far. (not tempratures or political ideologies) A 2-foot-tall mohawk is 極端.

components: 目 (eye) + 極 (extreme) = 目極める (get to the bottom of.)
description: to get to the bottom of. To exactly assess or find the reason for something.

components: 拷 (torture) + 問 (question, problem) = 拷問 (torture)
結婚 (to marry) + 式 (ritual) = 結婚式 (the marriage ceremony)
葬 (mourn) + 式 (ritual) = 葬式 (funeral)
儀 (politeness) + 式 (ritual) = 儀式 (ceremony)
description: Usually refers to a religious ceremony. Or sometimes a secular one: a swearing-in of a new president, or even someone with O.C.D. who has to clap their hands 4 times whenever they touch a doorknob!

components: 試 (attempt to do) + 験 (test) = 試験 (test)
labels: NP
description: a test, like in school - kind of formal. (BOOBOO : normally people just say テスト)

components: 武 (military) + 器 (instrument) = 武器 (weapon)
description: weapon: has the nuance of sword or small gun.

labels: SUF NOKURI
description: SUFFIX、usually found on store signs, meaning 'rental': room for rent, parking space for rent, etc.(FP;note how the last "shi" is pronounced but not written. )

components: 迷 (perplexed) + 惑 (be misguided or tempted) = 迷惑 (annoyance)
description: annoyance. Can be used as an adjective (迷惑なｘｘｘ） or as a verb (迷惑をかける＝to annoy).

components: 怪 (suspicious) + 我 (we) = 怪我 (scar)
labels: KANA FP
description:
injury. I am GUESSING that the difference between 怪我 and its synonym 傷 (kizu), is that kega emphasizes the severity while 傷emphasizes the appearance- spots, cuts, scabs, etc.

Also, another difference is that nobody uses 怪我 with kanji, and hardly anyone even uses the hiragana, thus making the whole fucking point moot.

components: 海 (ocean) + 賊 (bandit) = 海賊 (pirate)
description: pirate (pirate DVDs go by the wonderful neologism of "海賊版DVD")

components: 領 (territory) + 域 (region) = 領域 (domain)

description: a territory or domain controlled by someone. Also used in neologisms like "domain name!"

挑 (challenge) + 戦 (fight) = 挑戦 (challenge)
description: challenge (challenge yourself to do better, test your limits / challenge the system) be defiant or provocative. take the pepsi challenge!

meaning: bonsai. Oh man, this entry was so not worth even making. Deeeyamn.

components: 無 (without) + 職 (employment) = 無職 (unemployment)
職 (employment) + 場 (place) = 職場 (place of work.)
labels: KUN ON

components: 職 (employment) + 業 (business) = 職業 (occupation)

components: 巨 (giant super huge) + 大 (big) = 巨大 (huge guy! (or girl))

description: a giant, like Andre, but also a important person, as in, 'Microsoft is a giant in the software industry.'

components: 巨 (giant super huge) + 乳 (milk) = 巨乳 (tig ole biddies)

components: 巨 (giant super huge) + 根 (root) = 巨根 (that's right: monster cock.)

components: 博 (museum　/extensive) + 覧 (view) + 会 (big meeting) = 博覧会 (exposition)

a GIANT exposition. Not like, "Cezanne's greatest fuckin' paintings all up in here festival" but huger - like a World's Fair.

To break it down:

博覧会 (biggest　kind of expo )

　展示会（てんじかい＝trade show)

展覧会 （てんらんかい＝art exhibition)

labels: COUNTER
description: it's a counter for animals, up to maybe the size of a deer. (BOOBOO: anything bigger than a deer is counted with 'とう.')

components: 三 (three) + 匹 (small animal) = 三匹 (three small animals)

components: 絶 (extinct) + 滅 (annihilate) = 絶滅 (go extinct)

components: 快 (pleasant) + 感 (feeling) = 快感 (pleasure)
description: a physical sensation of pleasure - usually but not always sexual.

components: 愉 (pleasure) + 快 (pleasant) = 愉快 (amusing)
description: pleasant or amusing (a funny guy, hilarious comments, a fun time)

components: 怪 (suspicious) + 獣 (beast) = 怪獣 (Godzilla monster)
description: one of them 400-footer godzilla monsters with the zipper on the back.

components: 野 (field) + 獣 (beast) = 野獣 (beast)

components: 感 (feeling) + 動 (movement) = 感動 (emotionally moved)
description: to be moved by something (a song, a movie, a speech, a pretty poem about asndfisdnf)

components: 遺 (bequeath) + 憾 (regrettable) = 遺憾! (aaah shit!)

description: a fairly formal way to say, "Aaaah shiit!!" Really really regrettable, deplorable. Only use this about some big thing - North Koreans kidnapping people, or that time you accidentally wiped your nose with the Emperor's tie.

components: 封 (seal in) + 筒 (cylinder /pipe) = 封筒 (envelope)

components: 司 (administer) + 会 (big meeting) + 者 (professional) = 司会者 (master of ceremonies)
description: a master of ceremonies of a TV show or event. It's not used for 'sucker MCs' which is a darn shame.

components: 名 (name, famous) + 詞 (part of speech) = 名詞 (noun)
立 (stand up) + 派 (faction/bling) = 立派 (super high class!)

components: 派 (faction/bling) + 手 (hand) = 派手 (gaudy)

components: 派 (faction/bling) + 閥 (clique) = 派閥 (faction)

components: 人 (person) + 脈 (vein) = 人脈 (clout)

components: 手 (hand) + 袋 (sack) = 手袋 (gloves)
